gui.perspective.name: Perspective
gui.perspective.toasts.title: %s: %s
gui.perspective.toasts.license_update.de: Perspective is now licensed under LGPL-3.0-or-later.
gui.perspective.toasts.keybinding_confli:
Keybinding conflicts have been detected that could affect Perspective.
Please take a moment to review and adjust your keybindings as needed.
gui.perspective.toasts.update.title: Update Available
gui.perspective.toasts.development_warni: Please help us improve by submitting bug reports if you encounter any issues.
gui.perspective.toasts.downgrade_warning: You may experience configuration related issues.
gui.perspective.toasts.take_panorama_scr: You can enable the panorama in your resource pack menu by enabling the %s resource pack.
gui.perspective.toasts.tutorial.title: %s Tutorial: %s
gui.perspective.toasts.tutorial.super_se: You can cycle shaders with [%s] and disable them with [%s]. For more settings check out the Perspective config using [%s].
gui.perspective.toasts.warning.title: %s Warning: %s
gui.perspective.toasts.warning.photosens: Some shader effects may not be suitable for individuals with epilepsy or photosensitivity. Please exercise caution.
gui.perspective.config.update.title: Update Available
gui.perspective.config.zoom.increment_si: Sets the size of the increments used when changing the zoom level.
gui.perspective.config.shaders.hover: Open Perspective's Super Secret Settings config screen.
gui.perspective.config.shaders.shader.ho: Cycles through Perspective's Super Secret Settings.
gui.perspective.config.shaders.random.ho: Sets a random Super Secret Setting.
gui.perspective.config.shaders.toggle.ho: Toggle functionality of Perspective's Super Secret Settings.
gui.perspective.config.textured_entity.h: Open Perspective's Textured Entity config screen.
gui.perspective.config.textured_entity.n: Toggles functionality of Named Textured Entities.
gui.perspective.config.textured_entity.r: Toggle functionality of Random Textured Entities.
gui.perspective.config.april_fools_prank: Open Perspective's April Fools' Prank config screen.
Toggle if Perspective can run the April Fools' Prank.
Toggle if Perspective is forced into thinking it is currently April 1st. (Requires: Allow Prank)
gui.perspective.config.more_options.hove: Open Perspective's More Options config screen.
gui.perspective.config.more_options.vers: Toggle visibility of the Minecraft version overlay.
gui.perspective.config.more_options.forc: Toggle if Perspective is forced into thinking it is currently Pride Month.
gui.perspective.config.hide.hide_block_o: Toggles visibility of the block outline.
gui.perspective.config.toasts.detect_upd: Sets the release channel for in-game update notifications.
gui.perspective.config.information.docum: Open Perspective's Documentation website in your web browser.
gui.perspective.config.information.credi: Opens Perspective's Credits and Attribution page in your web browser.
gui.perspective.config.information.licen: Opens Perspective's Licenses page in your web browser.
gui.perspective.config.information.contr: Open Perspective's GitHub Repository in your web browser.
gui.perspective.config.information.repor: Open Perspective's Issues page in your web browser.
gui.perspective.config.experimental.warn:
Experiments are potential new features.
You may experience bugs and/or issues.
gui.perspective.config.experimental.none: There are no experiments currently available.
gui.perspective.config.reset.hover: Reset Perspective's config values to default.
gui.perspective.resource_pack.perspectiv: Adds new custom resources to Perspective's features.
